quranSection.title: Quran Distribution
quranSection.description: Our publications department manages the printing and distribution of the Holy Quran across the community. We ensure that every student and household has access to a quality copy of the Quran for learning and recitation.

features.text: High-quality Quran printing with clear typography

quranSection.ctaText: Your contribution helps print and distribute Quran copies to students and families in need.

materials.name: Islamic Textbooks
materials.description: Carefully curated textbooks covering Islamic studies, Quran, Hadith, and Fiqh for different age groups and learning levels.

materials.name: Student Guides
materials.description: Student workbooks, activity guides, and reference materials supporting the structured curriculum in our maktabs.

materials.name: Teaching Manuals
materials.description: Comprehensive teaching manuals for instructors with lesson plans, methodology guides, and assessment tools.
